title: Responsive Variants
description: Breakpoint-specific component overrides for responsive design

variantOverrides.description: Component properties to override at this breakpoint

content.description: Content to display at this breakpoint

x-specs.then: it should apply mobile className and styles

x-specs.given: a heading with different content per breakpoint (mobile, md, lg)
x-specs.when: viewport changes from mobile to tablet to desktop
x-specs.then: content should update to match each breakpoint

x-specs.given: a component with visible false on mobile, visible true on lg
x-specs.when: viewport changes from mobile to desktop
x-specs.then: component should be hidden on mobile and shown on large screens

x-specs.given: a component with different children at mobile vs desktop
x-specs.then: it should render different child components based on breakpoint

x-specs.given: a component with props overrides at sm breakpoint
a component with props overrides at md breakpoint
a component with props overrides at xl and 2xl breakpoints
x-specs.then: it should apply xl/2xl-specific props for very wide screens

x-specs.given: a component with mobile-first progression (mobile → sm → md → lg)
x-specs.when: viewport expands from mobile to desktop
x-specs.then: each breakpoint should override the previous, creating progressive enhancement

x-specs.given: a button with props, content, and visible all configured per breakpoint
